title: Anna
overview: An emotionally intense short film about a blind woman who is profoundly moved listening to her boyfriend interpret the end of Jean-Luc Godard's Contempt. She exits the cinema and smokes a cigarette, moved to tears, she embraces her boyfriend in a passionate hug.
